Kevin Hart and wife Eniko celebrated the upcoming arrival of their son, and did so in a lavish jungle - themed party attended by family and friends. The event took place at the Calamigos Beach Club in Malibu. During the party, the name of their son was revealed as Kenzo. And to celebrate that, Hart wore clothing from the brand Kenzo, the little one ’ s name was emblazoned on the photo booth wall, and “ KENZO ” was spelled out on top of the dessert table in big blue letters.
